The '*' character is accepted for wildcard addresses. +
+Note: In case the locator is bound to all local addresses, UDP membership-related traffic will be bound to the local host machine's address. +
+ bind to all addresses @@ -416,6 +420,14 @@ See Overview of the local host machine's address +\-\-membership-bind-address +Specifies the IP address to which the UDP membership-related traffic will be bound. If defined, it has precedence over the value of bind-address. Wildcard addresses are not accepted. +
+Note: By default, UDP membership-related traffic is bound to bind-address but there is one exception. In case the locator is bound to all local addresses, UDP membership-related traffic will be bound to the local host machine's address by default. +
+uses bind-address + + \-\-J Argument passed to the JVM on which the Locator will run. For example, specifying --J=-Dfoo.bar=true sets property "foo.bar" to "true".

If defined, it has precedence over the value of bind-address. Wildcard addresses are not accepted. +
+Note: By default, UDP membership-related traffic is bound to bind-address but there is one exception. In case the server is bound to all local addresses, UDP membership-related traffic will be bound to the local host machine's address by default. +
